history.content:
An important note on P/NP
  • The deadline is coming up, pay attention!
  • Any courses for the CS major/minor or EECS major/minor must be taken for a letter grade.
  • Credit for courses graded "Pass" may not exceed more than 1/3 of the total units undertaken and passed on the Berkeley campus towards the degree.
  • Students hoping to graduate with honors are required to fulfill certain requirements, including completing at least 43 letter-graded units. Junior transfer students should be especially aware of this requirement. 
  • If you have concerns about the P/NP requirements, please discuss with a College Adviser: CoE or L&S
history.subject: An important note on P/NP
